title: Effective extraction and determination of 24 quinolones in water and egg samples using a novel magnetic covalent organic framework combined with UPLC-MS/MS
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8303-8312
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00247D, Paper
Open Access

Na Li, Mengnan Liang, Hao Zhang, Zhongxia Hua, Ling Ma, Yanyu Qi, Ke Wang
We designed and fabricated a novel functionalized magnetic covalent organic framework as a magnetic solid-phase extraction (MSPE) absorbent for the determination of 24 quinolones.
